name: Hack'n'Loop
description:
Fight.Evolve.Loop.

THE IDEA

LD47 entry, the theme was "Stuck in a loop". You play as a computer program stuck in an endless loop. Fight viruses to get their energy and open the firewall. Then, you can choose between two bonuses. Each bonuses also comes with a malus, choose wisely. Then you loop again in the same room. Again and again.

CONTROLS

Gamepad recommended

  • Left joystick - Player Movement
  • X - Attack
  • B - Dash 
  • Start - Pause

Keyboard

  • ZQSD (WASD) - Player Movement
  • Spacebar - Attack
  • Shift - Dash
  • Escape - Pause
